agenda.description: ** REVISION ** HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF FORMAL MEETING COMMITTEE: Appropriations - S/C on Article III TIME & DATE: 2:00 PM or upon final adjourn./recess or bill referral if permission granted Tuesday, February 26, 2019 PLACE: E1.030 CHAIR: Rep. Greg Bonnen Please note that the time has changed from 7:30am to 2:00pm or upon final adjournment. The Appropriations Subcommittee on Article III will meet in a formal meeting to discuss House budget recommendations. The Subcommittee will discuss higher education. As a reminder, no public or agency testimony may be taken during a formal meeting. ** See Committee Coordinator for previous versions ** of the schedule, if applicable.
